name: Palimpsest [Draft 0.11]
description:
Palimpsest

A Setting and Hexcrawl in the Realm where Realms Go to Die

Created for the Tabletop Graveyard Jam

THIS IS A MOSTLY-FINISHED DRAFT THAT REALLY GOT AWAY FROM ME THAT WILL CONTINUE TO BE UPDATED AND EVENTUALLY WILL BE PROPERLY EDITED BY SOMEONE WHO KNOWS HOW TO DO THAT.

I was literally up until the wire exporting against the clock and rushing the first version of this page at gone 0500.

Currently, PWYW until the first draft is finished. When released at a set price community copies will be made available.

  • 44 Page PDF
  • GM Map 
  • Player Map 
  • Cover and The Inexpungible Art Commissioned by Evlyn Moreau
  • Hexmap created using Hexkit by Cone Of Negative Energy
  • Perplexing Ruins Hex Map Tile Set
  • Lots of atmospheric art from licensed Patreons, paid art packs, and Creative Commons resources

Inspirations

  • Between the Skies by Huffa
  • Bloodborne 
  • Dark Souls
  • The Dark Tower by Stephen King
  • Into the Odd & Electric Bastionland by  Chris McDowall
  • Mad Max 
  •  Mausritter by Losing Games 
  •  MÖRK BORG by Pelle Nilsson & Johan Nohr
  • Rune by Gila RPGS
  • Troika! by Melsonia Arts Council
  • We Deal in Lead by Odin’s Beard RPG
  • and more

Additional Art & Assets

  • Chaoclypse 
  • David Markiwsky 
  • Evlyn Moreau
  • Justin Vandermeer
  • Karl Druid
  • Perplexing Ruins
  • Roque Romero
  • Thomas Novosel
  • and more
